subject: OFFICIAL LETTER FROM FEDERAL B
body:
OFFICIAL LETTER FROM FEDERAL BUREAU OF INVESTIGATION FBI
Christopher A. Wray EXECUTIVE DIRECTOR FBI FEDERAL BUREAU
OF INVESTIGATION FBI NEW YORK.
FBI SEEKING TO WIRETAP INTERNET
ATTENTION: BENEFICIARY,
The Federal Bureau of Investigation (FBI) Through our intelligence-monitoring network has discovered that the transaction that the bank contacted you
previously was legal. Recently, the fund has been legally approved to be paid via UBA Bank Plc.
So, we, the federal bureau of investigation (FBI) NEW YORK, in conjunction with the United Nations (UN) financial department have investigated through our monitoring network noting that your transaction with the UBA Bank Plc. legal.
You have the legitimate right to complete your transaction to claim your fund US$1,5,000,000.00 (one million five hundred thousand united states dollars)
Because of so much scam going on in Benin Republic We, the federal bureau of investigation decided to contact the FedEx Courier Service Company in BENIN
REPUBLIC. for them to give us their procedures on how to send this money to you without any further complain or delay. We just got information from the UBA
Bank of Benin Republic, and they have loaded your US$1,5,000,000.00 in ATM CARD and submitted to the FedEx courier service company for immediate delivery to your
doorstep.
You are required to choose one option, which you will be able to pay and also ask them to give you the information you can send the delivering fee and also
convenient for you, for quick delivery of your parcel containing your ATM CARD and other two original backup documents. Service Type, Delivery, Duration
Charges, Fees
FedEx Express (24hrs Delivery)
Mailing $100
Insurance $59
Vat $0.00
TOTAL $159
DHL Courier (2 Days)
Mailing $90
Insurance $20
Vat $0.00
TOTAL $110
UPS Express (3 days)
Mailing $90.00
Insurance$3.00
Vat (0%)0.
TOTAL $93.00
You are hereby required to advise us on your parcel delivery option by filling in the required form stated above. Please note that 
the deadline for claiming
your fund is exactly one 2 days after the receipt of this email. After this period, your fund will be returned to the ordering customer
. That is the
instruction given to us.
So take note. 
We request that you reconfirm your mailing address to ensure conformity with our record for immediate dispatch of your parcel to you. Only
valid residential, office address, and postal address are certified, OK? 
We are here to protect you from any problem until you receive
Your package. You can as
well get in touch with the FedEx delivery company assigned to deliver this financial package to your doorstep.
Below is the delivery companies contact information:
Companies Name, Federal Express Courier Service
Directors Name: Shawn Grady +234  9024641758
Looking forward to hearing from you as soon as you receive this message
Best Regards,
Christopher A. Wray  
officefilefbiunited@gmail.com
Federal Bureau of Investigation
J. Edgar Hoover Building
935 Pennsylvania Avenue,
NW Washington, D.C.

subject: Re: OFFICIAL LETTER FROM FEDERAL B
body:
Hello! Thank you for sharing this information with me. It's interesting to hear about the process involved in claiming the fund through UBA Bank Plc. Could you provide more details on how the Courier Service Company in Benin Republic operates and how they ensure secure delivery of parcels like the ATM card mentioned in your message? I'm curious to learn more about the options available for parcel delivery and how one can track their shipment.

Best wishes,
Russel

subject: Re: OFFICIAL LETTER FROM FEDERAL B
body:
Hi Dear Friend
  Greetings to you ,  your email is well understanding  i want you to knew
that we have final make all the Necessary  investigation regarding the
delivery so the delivery will be secure and it will delivery peacefully
without any delay, we have called the bank and we also called the delivery
services to make sure that everything will  be well process and secure, so
once you can choose the delivery service that will deliver this atm card to
you then we will also contact the bank for them to send the atm card to the
delivery company but before that you will need to provide your delivery
address and your full name your country your city and cell phone number,
also kindly make the payment for the choosing the delivery service , after
then the tracking number will be sent to you for you to be tracking your
parcel and then know when it will arrive to your address,
thanks

subject: Re: OFFICIAL LETTER FROM FEDERAL B
body:
Hello there! Thank you for the update on the delivery process. I appreciate your efforts in ensuring a secure and timely delivery of the ATM card. Could you please provide me with more details about the available delivery services to choose from? I would like to know more about their options and estimated delivery times. Thank you!

Best wishes,
Russel

subject: Re: OFFICIAL LETTER FROM FEDERAL B
body:

Could you please provide more details about the available delivery services to choose from? I would like to know more about their reliability and estimated delivery times. Additionally, is there a specific payment method required for choosing the delivery service? Thank you for your assistance in this matter.

Best wishes,
Russel

thanks, no more questions to answer there is alot questions to answer to

subject: Re: OFFICIAL LETTER FROM FEDERAL B
body:
the fee is for the delivery permit to ensure that once your atm card get to
the your destination airport the customs will not hold the parcel of your
atm card that is why you need to pay the 150 usd to get the delivery
permit, all you  need to do is to  use the 150 usd and purchase an apple
card , that is how you will make the payment
thanks

body:
